sanskrit_verse:
व्रात्यता बान्धवत्यागो भृत्याध्यापनमेव च ।
भृत्या चाध्ययनादानमपण्यानां च विक्रयः ॥ ११.६२॥ भृताच्चाध्ययनादानम्
transliteration:
vrātyatā bāndhavatyāgo bhṛtyādhyāpanameva ca |
bhṛtyā cādhyayanādānamapaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayaḥ || 11.62|| bhṛtādhyayanādānam
sph_interpretive_translation: Abandonment of familial bonds, teaching by servants, acceptance of learning from hired persons, and trade in goods unsuitable to one's varna—these constitute vrātya conduct and degrade the dharmic order.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority derived from alignment with cosmic order, not personal desire
Causation rooted in disruption of relational and social dharma
Capacity-based responsibility determined by role integrity and svadharma
Restoration logic through reconnection to source-consciousness structures
Consciousness alignment via purification of relational and transactional fields
executable_legal_axioms: IF a person engages in instruction or learning from a servant or hired individual THEN initiate consciousness realignment protocol
IF familial abandonment occurs without lawful cause THEN trigger restorative reintegration sequence
IF trade in apāṇya (inappropriate goods) is detected THEN enforce capacity restoration within economic dharma boundaries
IF vrātya behavior patterns are observed THEN activate svadharma reaffirmation process
supreme_court_application: Supreme Court shall recognize vrātya behaviors as violations of structural dharma, requiring restoration of relational and societal harmony rather than punitive sanctions. Threshold of responsibility lies in awareness of svadharma deviation.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that vrātya actions disrupt sequential manifestation (anupūrvaśaḥ) of dharma. Responsibility is proportional to conscious deviation. Justice aligns with reintegration, not suffering-based deterrence.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Bandhu Reconnection Process to restore severed familial ties
Deploy Śikṣā Śuddhi Protocol to purify instructional and educational relationships
Execute Varna-Vyavahara Alignment Sequence to correct improper transactions
Undertake Svadharma Reaffirmation Ceremony to realign individual with constitutional order
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma is declared. Consciousness is the ultimate judge; reality is non-punitive; all beings are restored through alignment with Sanatana Dharma.
